How to prolong the life of flowers: 8 working tips.\n\n 1. Trim flowers just before putting them in water. Through a fresh cut, water is better supplied to the buds and the bouquet will last longer. Trim the flowers with a sharp knife or secateurs at a 45-degree angle. When changing the water in the vase, trim ...

We are confident in the freshness of our flowers, so we give a guarantee. If our bouquet withered within 2 days (this can happen with roses, peonies, hydrangeas, matthiolas - all delicate flowers), we will offer more resistant options to replace or bring the same ones from the next delivery.
